parameters.name: UniqueName
parameters.description: Unique ID of this message bar

title: ISldWorks.DefineMessageBar
description: Called by a SOLIDWORKS add-in, creates a message bar definition object.

parameters.name: UniqueName
parameters.description: Unique ID of this message bar

remarks:
It is the add-in's responsibility to ensure that the ID is unique by using, for example, a combination of add-in module name and unique message identifier:
"MyAddInName+ID_MYMESSAGE1"
